SFV001: SFV001: No api key is defined while initializing Sainofirst services. Please add api key as environment variable SAINOFIRST_API_KEY or pass it as an argument to constructor function
SFT001: SFT001: Api key must be of type string
SFV002: SFV002: Api key must not be a empty string
SFT004: SFT004: Expected object or function data type
SFV007: SFV007: 'message' should not be a empty string
SFV008: SFV008: 'senderid' should not be a empty string
SFV009: SFV009: 'route' should not be a empty string
SFV010: SFV010: 'number' should not be a empty array
SFT010: SFT010: 'unicode' should be a number and its value should either be 0 or 1
SFT011: SFT011: 'flash' should be a number and its value should either be 0 or 1
SFT013: SFT013: 'time' should not be a empty string
SFV011: SFV011:  please enter time in proper format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
SFT014: SFT014: 'subsscription_id' should be of type number
SFT015: SFT015: 'maxLengthOfCall' should be of type number
SFV017: SFV017: elements of numbers array must be string
SFV018: SFV018: numbers array should not have empty strings
SFT019: SFT019: 'send_at' should not be a empty string
SFV019: SFV019:  please enter 'send_at' in proper format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
SFV020: SFV020: you must provide a 'timezone' while scheduling a call
SFV021: SFV021: 'timezone 'must not be an empty string
SFV022: SFT022: 'config' cannot be a empty object
SFT022: SFT022: 'repeat' must be of type number
SFT023: SFT023: 'callTransfer' must be of type dict
SFV023: SFT023: 'callTransfer' cannot be a empty object
SFV026: SFV026: text field cannot be undefined while sending a text to speech voice call
SFT026: SFT026: text field should be of type string
SFV027: SFV027: text field should not be empty string
SFT027: SFT027: 'speech_rate' should be of type number
SFT028: SFT028: 'language_id' should be of type number
SFV030: SFV030: 'audio_file_url' field cannot be undefined while sending a text to speech voice call
SFT029: SFT029: 'audio_file_url' field should be of type string
SFV031: SFV031: 'audio_file_url' field should not be empty string
SFT032: SFT032: 'new_send_at' should not be a empty string
SFV035: SFV035:  please enter 'new_send_at' in proper format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)
